author: cornl
title: Cardano local live events - Poland
description: There is a real "need" of live local crypto events in Poland. Why not under Cardano brand? Let's popularize our favourite ecosystem together
solution: Local events throughout Poland with guests, aimed at regular crypto enthusiasts, traders, people who "heard" but never "experienced" crypto.
experience: Exploring crypto market since 2017. Cardano Ambassador - 2018. Speaker on various non-crypto conferences. Rich social network of contacts.
